prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
I ordered a dress online, and it arrived two sizes too small. I'm really disappointed.  
The service at the restaurant was painfully slow, and my food was cold when it finally arrived.  
I contacted support about a billing issue, and they were completely unhelpful. What a waste of time!  
The app crashes every time I try to use it. I regret downloading it in the first place.  
My recent trip was a disaster due to multiple delays and a lack of communication from the airline.  
I expected much better quality for the price I paid. This product is not worth it.  
I felt ignored by the staff during my visit. It really ruined the experience for me.  
The subscription promised exclusive content, but I haven’t seen anything new in months.  
I was misled by the advertising, which showed a completely different product than what I received.  
The hotel room was dirty, and the amenities were not as described online. Very disappointing.  
I tried to return an item, but the process was confusing and frustrating. I will not shop here again.  
The food was bland and overpriced. I won't be coming back to this restaurant.  
I had to wait on hold for over an hour to resolve a simple issue. Ridiculous!  
The service was lackluster, and the staff seemed indifferent to our needs.  
I wish I had read the reviews before buying this. It's nothing like what was advertised.  
The flight was overbooked, and I was left stranded. Not impressed with this airline.  
I had high hopes for this app, but it’s full of bugs and glitches. Very frustrating!  
The waiter forgot my order entirely, and when I reminded him, he was rude about it.  
The checkout process was a nightmare, and it felt like I was being scammed.  
I’m really unhappy with the customer service. I felt like I was talking to a robot.  
The tour guide was unenthusiastic and seemed to rush through everything.  
I was charged twice for my subscription, and it took forever to get a refund.  
The product broke after just one use. I expected much better quality.  
The restaurant was noisy, and I couldn’t hear my friends speak. Not the experience I wanted.  
I ordered a coffee that tasted burnt, and the barista didn’t seem to care.  
The website was confusing, and I couldn’t find the information I needed.  
I received a damaged item and the return process was a hassle. Disappointing experience.  
I was promised a delivery within two days, but it took over a week!  
The food was bland, and there were too many flies around. I won’t be back.  
I found the staff to be unprofessional and dismissive during my visit.  
The app keeps freezing, making it impossible to use. Very frustrating.  
I was really looking forward to this trip, but the accommodations were subpar.  
The quality of the item I received was nothing like the picture. I feel cheated.  
I had to deal with a very rude customer service representative. Not acceptable!  
The atmosphere was dull, and the service was lackluster. I expected more.  
I was promised a refund for a canceled service, but it never came through.  
I had a terrible experience with my last order, and I won’t be returning.  
The hotel was not clean, and the staff did not seem concerned about it.  
I waited too long for my food, and it was not worth the wait at all.  
The tech support was not knowledgeable and couldn’t help me fix my issue.  
I found the product to be of very low quality and not as described.  
The restaurant was understaffed, and it showed in the service we received.  
I was extremely disappointed by the lack of options on the menu.  
I had to escalate my complaint to a manager to get any resolution.  
The service I received was far below what I expected for the price.  
My recent experience was marred by constant interruptions and noise.  
The staff was not friendly, and I felt unwelcome during my visit.  
I expected a lot more from this subscription service, and I’m left feeling cheated.  
I was excited for my order, but it arrived late and in poor condition.  
The tour was poorly organized, and we missed several key sights.
